title: Camera error
content: I just buy a google pixel 4 XL new seal box from google store Us. But i have a problem wtih my camera phone. In camera general setting ( 1x zoom) , my camera cannot stable, cannot focus to subject. But in zoom 2x, 3x setting camera run good. I tr√≠ed reset my phone but it is same. I think my camera phone have error. Can you help me ? I am in Vietnam.
